description: This file defines a React functional component named ClassCard that renders a class information card with a booking button. It exports the component as default and uses props for title, level, description, and onBook callback.

methods.name: ClassCard({ title, level, description, onBook })
methods.description: A React functional component rendering class details with a booking button.

ctags.name: ClassCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ClassCard({ title, level, description, onBook }) {$/
